properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 6 at 8:49PM EST until February 8 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow
accumulations of 5 to 8 inches with localized amounts up to 10
inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch.

* WHERE...Chenango county.

* WHEN...Until midnight EST Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult, especially during the
Friday morning and midday commute. Heavy snow combined with
gusty winds will likely cause scattered power outages.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy at times Friday morning
into the early afternoon, with snowfall rates of two inches per
hour possible.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST FRIDAY NIGHT
